meanings.definition: The writing of the lives of saints.
meanings.sent1: The hagiography of Saint Francis detailed his noble deeds.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading the hagiography of various saints.
meanings.sent3: The hagiography of the local baker made him seem like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her hagiography of the teacher painted him as a wise sage.
meanings.sent5: The hagiography of the firefighter was filled with tales of bravery.

meanings.sent1: The hagiography of Saint Patrick described his missionary work.
meanings.sent2: People often study the hagiography of different saints.
meanings.sent3: The hagiography of the cat turned it into a legendary figure.
meanings.sent4: His hagiography of the artist portrayed her as a creative genius.
meanings.sent5: Reading the hagiography of Saint Joan inspired her.

meanings.definition: A highly idealized or idolized biography.
meanings.sent1: The hagiography of the king depicted him as a flawless ruler.
meanings.sent2: The hagiography of the actress exaggerated her talents.
meanings.sent3: The hagiography of the dog made it seem like a perfect pet.
meanings.sent4: His hagiography of the musician elevated her to legendary status.
meanings.sent5: The hagiography of the explorer turned him into a mythic hero.
